texto: 04:42:14 UTC from IEEE Xplore. Restrictions apply. ISO/IEC/IEEE 12207:2017(E) creating and using the enabling system. Creating the enabling system can be viewed as a separate project and subsequently as another system‐of‐interest. Further elaboration of these concepts can be found in ISO/IEC/IEEE 24748 (all parts) on the application of life cycle processes. NOTE Enabling systems in software development include software development and test environments for target platforms.
